title: The Gambler
description: HIM... I will get out from behind these bars.  I’ll make those who put me here pay.  All I need is her; the lock to my cell.   HER... I’m a geeky hacktivist; the internet is my oyster.  But that’s not going to save my family.  I need him; a Kraken to beat a shark.   Game on...    Disclaimer: * contains adult language and (explicit) steamy scenes * contains levels of geekiness * can be read as a standalone
author: Shanna Bell
